jchess.gamelogic.pieces

Interface IPieceBehaviour

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public interface IPieceBehaviour
    Determines the behaviour of a piece. This counts movements as well as restriction on those.
    Author:
    Florian Bethe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canMoveMultipleSteps()
      Can the piece move multiple times along a single direction.
      boolean canSkipOverPieces()
      Can a piece skip over other pieces on the board.
      java.util.Set<Direction> getCapturingMovements() 
      java.util.Set<Direction> getNormalMovements()
